website_summaries.verdict: Although we regret that Koss doesn't include a remote on the cable, the Pro4S is an excellent studio monitor headphone that audiophiles will appreciate for its neutral sound design, forward-thinking features and generous warranty that guarantees no-question replacements for life.
pros: The Koss Pro4S headphones have a closed-back design that attenuates outside noise while keeping sound leaks at bay, while the memory foam ear cups keep them comfortably seated on your head
They come with a detachable cable that plugs into jacks on either side of the cups, and Koss includes a ballistic nylon carrying case, in addition to its generous lifetime warranty
cons: Their naturally even register may weaken the "edge" of some artificially-produced songs
The headphones come with a coiled cable, but it's missing a microphone and an in-line remote control for changing tracks and adjusting volume through a smartphone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound across the entire frequency range from well-built headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Fantastic sound all across the range, from controlled, well-placed, yet powerful bass, to sparkling highs (without harshness). Listened with these andto classic rock, jazz, acoustic, post-rock, and some Daft Punk, and they excelled at all of them. Highly recommend, with or without a DAC. My only wish is that the soundstage was a bit wider, but with the sturdy build quality, lifetime warranty, detatchable cable, carrying case, good looks, and beautiful sound otherwise, I can overlook that.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like these.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Koss fan; I have always loved their sound. These headphones were no exception, however the build quality was very disappointing. Not something I expect from Koss. Just putting them on my head Would cause a short or a distortion and sound. If I move my head back-and-forth, same thing. I thought maybe it was the cord, but that was tight. My only guess is it was something internal. I really wanted to like these headphones. I own many Koss headphones, but I cannot add these to my collection. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Studio Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I had looked or shopped or reviewed many "studio" type headphones before making the decision to purchase these Koss Pro4S jobbers. I am happy to report that I did my research quite well because these have proven to be some excellent headphones. They are well built. They are light weight. They have an excellent fit design. They deliver excellent sound reproduction. For the small recording studio that I have setup for my bass guitar playing, these particular headphones fit my needs quite well. Highly recommended. They also come with a quality storage case and cable pass through. 5 stars on these so just stop looking, save some money and purchase these ones :)
customer_reviews.author: JimTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad comfort.
customer_reviews.text: They sound good, really good actually but they are really uncomfortable despite what other reviews says. I don't know how anyone can say these are comfortable. Besides, these are one of those headphones that are advertised as over the ear headphones but they actually sit on your ears and to make matters worse, it has a horrible clamping force which makes your jaw hurt. If you have a small head and small ears you will be fine, if you're a female or a child only then these will fit you. If you're a man, stay away from these. Even though they sound good, I was unable to enjoy them due to lack of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my godson. He reviewed all sorts of headphones that were $100 or less in magazines like audio file. He chose these and is exquisitely happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, comfortable, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Primary use is for monitoring live video recordings and listening to playback during editing. These phones, with the removable cord, are convenient. The sound quality is excellent — very clean and clear — which allows us to tightly monitor the recordings and make sure the sound is spot on. Additionally, the comfort is great during long periods of use. The phones appear to be well made, which is a plus in our environment. If sound quality is important, these are a great option.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you like flat sound!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these. The sound is terrific, just the way I like it. Flat, great fidelity, no boomy bass. Very good for voices on TV. I don't have to crank up the volume a lot (which is a relief). The only small negatives are they get a little warm to wear and fit maybe a little too snugly. But I've warn them for up to 3 hours with few problems.
customer_reviews.author: Culture Vulture

customer_reviews.title: Koss for the win
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, most excellent sound quality. However.. Right headphone input jack has gone wonky so forced to use left input which takes the cord across my body when I'm plugged into my V10 and moving around, not ideal. Outside of this annoyance I love these cans.
customer_reviews.author: Muddy

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift for a replacement
customer_reviews.text: The gift recipient chose this as the one they wanted for the quality, comfort and value. They were very pleased with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones. used for studio work. Balanced clean sound. Very neutral which is what you want in a studio headphone. Very comfortable with the D shaped ear cup. If you want headphones just for music where you are on your iPod, and want big bass, then don't get these. They are not for that purpose unless you like proper sound.
customer_reviews.author: Saavy Stylist

customer_reviews.title: I've been a fan of Koss headphones since the70s.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of Sennheiser HD 650 Open Back Professional Headphones from Amazon but was not satisfied with the sound quality so I thought I'd give these Koss a try and glad I did. Sound quality is great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Blew it out of the water!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and product is outstanding. Never thought koss would make a great studio headphone but i think they blew this one out of the water. i did alot of research looking for a studio headphone under 150 bucks. I kept excluding certain brands because of bad reviews. Everyone says this headphone has alot of bass and it was a turn off but to me, they sound great! keep up the good work koss!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Whittleman

customer_reviews.title: Headset fail
customer_reviews.text: These were great till they broke I don't know if we still have them
customer_reviews.author: ging

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Comfortable Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound very good. Fairly neutral and are probably the most comfortable headphones I've ever owned. You could wear these all day. Great sound and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BrianInRiverside

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable with excellent sound quality. Also they don't emit any sound which I like and one can't hear outside noise either.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect what I need.
customer_reviews.text: I had Koss head phones years ago, and they lasted for sometime. I know about this brand si I felt comfortable purchasing another product from them.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable wearing, nice seal around the ears. The sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked great.....as long as the cord was situated just right. If it wasn’t you’d only get sound out of one side. Not the way I would have engineered them but then again I’m no engineer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique, Comfortable design
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the frequency range and unique over the ear design.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Freis

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound
customer_reviews.text: Brings outstanding clarity to baroque music. Difficult to explain as it is not just a matter of frequency response.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral sounding phones
customer_reviews.text: I love the natural sound these phones provide. They are also very comfortable and durable. An excellent option to the way more expensive typical noise cancelling phones out there which in my view are not really necessary in most circumstances anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Markley

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great comfort for long periods of time. Easy to go all day listening.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Malsack

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for hubby. He wears them (almost) 24/7! Says the sound quality is excellent! Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best sounding headphones I have used. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Joe V

customer_reviews.title: POOR Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound, VERY POOR quality. One of the folding stems broke within 2 weeks of purchase. Buyer beware. Get them on sale, or find something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Joseph Coyne III

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love these
customer_reviews.text: But I can't. Yes, they sounded fantastic with everything I threw at them from piano trio jazz to the Beastie Boys to Peter Frampton. And they're well made. My issue is that they just aren't comfortable. After an hour, my hears are burning hot. After an hour and a half, my head is killing me from the pressure and it's not like I got a big melon head either. I bought a pair of Philips L2BO/27 Fidelio High Fidelity Headphones on Amazon's Black Friday deal and they easily sound as good as the Koss and absolutely run circles around them for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the money. Very satisfying bass, mids and high. Can be driven by my smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Lim TL

customer_reviews.title: Marriage
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I have such a problem. The headphones came in a robotic state. But with assembly defects. The headphone holder will burst in the middle, in the left earpiece, the cable jack is biased to the side, making it difficult to connect the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: romahatrader

customer_reviews.title: Great clean accurate sound.
customer_reviews.text: I own lots of koss products and thease are the best yet. Also lifetime warranty can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but only one problem.
customer_reviews.text: There's is a little bit of creaking you can hear when you move your head up and down and sise to side.
customer_reviews.author: edward balko

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: light weight and comfortable, great set of headphones for not much money.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Shibata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones that I use both for music, TV, and conference calls. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark I

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who prefer pure, unaltered sound.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product! Very crisp. NOTE: This is for people who like the unadulterated studio-type headphones that don't add color to the sound. You hear whatever you hear, and if you want to add any effects or anything like that, you'll have to add them in by tweaking your software EQ. I prefer this style of headphone but I know some more casual users don't.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Am very satisfied and very glad I ordered this item.
customer_reviews.author: Miragefrappant

customer_reviews.title: Great value for over-the-ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great value with a pretty good sound. I have used Pro 4 headphones since the 1970s and they have improved with succeeding models. Other brands might sound better (Bose and B&W) but cost hundreds more.
customer_reviews.author: Beemer geek

customer_reviews.title: Great company, products.
customer_reviews.text: Great Bass. High end frequencies....so so..great for a dj im sure
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor/accurate headphone.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphone. Beats the Audio-Technica comparative model in detail and resolution. Good recordings sound great and bad recordings sound just that- bad. Fit and finish are outstanding. This is my new reference mid-affordable closed headphone. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John Tim Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones, good bass, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. Good bass...which is always a must. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gutschow

customer_reviews.title: Love love love them
customer_reviews.text: Loud like it said very comfortable predict pair of head phones love them
customer_reviews.author: clubbgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very light
customer_reviews.text: Really confortable!! I wear about it 4 hours non stop! Dont hurt my hear! Good quality and very light!
customer_reviews.author: cajivel

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted these headphones to be nice. I wanted to purchase Koss because they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these headphones to be nice. I wanted to purchase Koss because they are located in my home town of Milwaukee. They sound really good while playing my Nord keyboard but as soon as I put music through it (Rock) they do not sound good at all. This is difficult as I am a musician and need to pick out certain parts of a song to learn them and it makes it difficult. May work better with different styles of music.
customer_reviews.author: DennyJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them but not enough bass
customer_reviews.text: Love them but not enough bass. Good quality though was very disappointed at how long they took to get to my house as I am a Prime member and instead of two days, it took a week to arrive. Other then that, good headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.author: michael geoghegan

customer_reviews.title: happy head and ears here
customer_reviews.text: i got these a few months ago and i am thrilled at how well they cancel out any external sound. i got these by default. i ordered first the old pro 4s like i had when i was much younger. i put them on and thankfully they were defective in one side. i also realized that my 62 year old neck did not want these weights on my head. so when they were returned for this style i could not be happier. work well where ever they have been plugged in. and they can be attached on either side of the head. that is a swell improvement over time. i made a good call on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Potter

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality as
customer_reviews.text: Fair sound. Not great quality as advertised. No problems with sound quality. Use them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Serneik

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: THESE HEADPHONES SOUND GREAT OUT OF THE BOX IN 50 HOURS I'LL BET THEY WILL BE SPECTACULAR--GREAT SOUNDSTAGE-VERY COMFORTABLE-LOOKS GREAT- BEAUTIFUL SOUND-FAST SHIPPING- GREAT PRICE-LIFETIME WARRANTY-THESE MAY BE THE LAST HEADPHONES I'LL NEED -THANK YOU KOSS AND THANK YOU AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett K.

customer_reviews.title: Sound as good as headphones 10 times the price and yes I  have a pair
customer_reviews.text: Koss really hit one out of the ballpark with these sound volume and clarity reminds me 41 years ago when I got my first pair of pro 4AA and I loved them. Still play my music at obnoxious volumes. Yes my parents hated it but kept buying expensive equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Desiderio

product_meta.title: Koss Pro4S Full Size Studio Headphones, Black with Silver Trim
feature_bullets: Design Your Music with these professional, unbiased, fine-tuned Studio Headphones
Aluminum Construction - comfort and durability meet in this lightweight headphone
Dual Choice Entry - choose either left of right cord entry and monitor through multiple headphones with a unique pass-through feature
Contour Sealing Cushion - the unique D-profile closes gaps around the ear, improving comfort, fit, isolation, and sound
Koss SLX40 Dynamic Element precisely tuned to accurately convey the sound produced in the studio. Connectivity Technology: Wired Detachable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
